title: Cartesian to Spherical Converter | Convert (x, y, z) to (ρ, θ, φ)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: ρ = √(x² + y² + z²) θ = atan2(y, x) φ = arccos(z / ρ)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: r = √(x² + y² + z²) θ = arccos(z / r) φ = atan2(y, x)
